name: Pi718
description:
Explore and solve puzzles to decode left genes on the planet.

Important !!! The game has no saves, so you need to finish it in one time. It's 15-20 minutes long.

Exploring part

Goal: Find all genes on map

Control:

  • WASD - the movement of the character
  • ESC - you can left the game in every moment
Minigame part:

Goal: Color all check in the grid.

Control:

  • WASD - change direction
  • E - swap with object
  • SPACE - jump over the object and change it 
  • R - reset object position

Rules: You can swap with any object. You can jump over white objects if it has empty cell after.

Assets

All assets were borrowed from the other sources.

Tiles and sprites:

- https://szadiart.itch.io/postapo-lands-demo

- https://clbnlsn.itch.io/mini-robot-and-cheese-cube

- https://opengameart.org/content/10-basic-message-boxes

Music:

- https://gamesounds.xyz/?dir=99Sounds/The%20Weird%20Side%20Samples%20%2899Sounds%...

- https://gamesounds.xyz/?dir=Kongano/Ambience
